pkgmetadata.longdescription: An IPFS-mirrored ebuild for UT2004 Editor's Choice Edition Bonus Pack. If you're unable to download it via IPFS for whatever reason, try searching the web for the file SHA1sums: 8289029501eca2764e75ea49a2423de2fbc13794 UT2004-ONSBonusMapPack.zip 97f7865bc1b5c70ec82498b79ce7d85a4a26e40b ut2004megapack-linux.tar.bz2
